title: Abuggi
author: Abuggi
content: Hi bitcointalk members, it is a pleasure to join this great forum of Bitcoin. I was introduced to this forum recently when I showed interest in Bitcoin. I was told I will get hand full of information about it here. I have been going through learnmeabitcoin.com which I came across online for some days now. Now I want to start interacting here as well as I am learning more about Bitcoin. I want your guidance as senior members in the forum here. Thanks.

comments.body: Quote from: Abuggi on October 31, 2023, 04:51:54 PMHi bitcointalk members, it is a pleasure to join this great forum of Bitcoin. I want your guidance as senior members in the forum here. Thanks.Welcome to this forum, and keep growing in learning BTC and making money out of it. I suggest you ask that guy who introduced you to this forum, and I suggest you visit your local community because we have local communities here where you can find your native language-speaking friends, and they can help you in a better way about how the forum works and how you can remain here safely and for a longer period of time.And the positive side is that if you are not a native English speaker, then you can talk in the local language, but on your own.Other than this, I will suggest you read first and then write strategy. In this, you should read other people's posts and take ideas from what they are sharing and how you can contribute and learn new things. For example, if you are reading some topic and on the second page you find that this member made a wrong statement and you knew it because of your knowledge, then you should quote him and correct him, and that's called a contribution. You should help others with their problems, just as we are helping you with yours.In short, be supportive, be open-minded, do not be afraid to ask questions or give replies, and learn new things.

I want your guidance as senior members in the forum here. Thanks. Welcome to the forum. You are in the perfect site to learn everything about bitcoin. You don't have to read everything and take a lot of your time if you are eager to learn about bitcoin. For your information, learning in the forum should not be a pressure on your part, but just enjoy the forum itself together with the rest of the members. That way, learning becomes easier for you and just try to read and understand that catches your attention. Although you will find it hard at the start, but do also some researching on the words that you are not familiar so you will also be guided while you are in the process of learning.I believe that you also come here not just to learn to but eventually to make profits later on, and I truly understand you as everyone here started from a scratch. But for now, focus more on understanding bitcoin and all that are related in the crypto market. Don't rush on earning some profits because you will definitely reach that point when you already understand the purpose of this forum. Just enjoy your stay here, and if you do it more openly and with positive attitude, you will learn a lot easier and faster. Learning takes time, and if you want to maximize learning, don't be too serious but learn to have fun while learning.
